Odoo for Coworking

Welcome to the Odoo Coworking Management package!

This suite of applications is designed to meet the needs of coworking spaces; whether you manage a boutique shared office, a multi-location coworking hub, or a community-driven workspace. With Odoo, you can centralize your operations in one place: from selling memberships and booking meeting rooms to engaging your community and organizing staff schedules.

With fully integrated apps such as CRM, Subscription, Website, Events, Helpdesk, and Planning, the solution streamlines daily management, enhances member services, and keeps your workspace running efficiently.

Focus on growing your coworking community, while Odoo takes care of the logistics. üíº

Basics

You can access every installed app in your Odoo database from your main dashboard.

  • CRM & Membership: Track and manage coworking opportunities, follow-up, and convert them into active members.

  • Subscription: Automate recurring memberships such as Business Address or Unlimited Monthly Access.

  • Sales: Generate and manage quotations for memberships, room bookings, and services.

  • Appointment : Allow prospects to book a free tour, shared desk, or meeting room online.

  • Website: Promote coworking offers, showcase events, and provide member-exclusive tools and support forms.

  • Events: Organize networking sessions, workshops, and community-building activities.

  • Email Marketing : Share news, updates, and promotions with your members.

  • Helpdesk: Handle member requests and issues efficiently.

  • Planning: Schedule reception desk coverage and other staff shifts.

Stay Connected with Your Community

Keep your members informed and connected with emails and events.

  1. Send members the new Wi-Fi code, upcoming events, and important updates via Email Marketing. 
    1. Create a new mailing.
    2. Select recipients using filters like Members, Prospects, or Event Attendees.
    3. Design your message with the drag-and-drop editor.
    4. Personalize content using dynamic fields (e.g., member name, booked room).
    5. Send or schedule your email and track opens and clicks.
  3. Let members report issues (e.g., coffee machine broken, Wi-Fi down) via a website form and manage all requests in the Helpdesk app.
  4. Event Creation: Organize networking nights, workshops, or skill-sharing sessions; publish them on your website and allow online registration.
    1. Create events for members or the public.
    2. Set time slots, ticket types, and attendance limits if needed.
    3. Choose event visibility: make it public or accessible only to members via a shared link.
    4. Customize the event page on your website with all the details (location, agenda, facilities).
    5. Share event links via email or social media so members and guests can sign up easily.
